channel.title: South Africa on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in South Africa on Damien Saunders

item.title: South Africa … 5 million online and growing
item.description: South Africa is one of the fastest growing markets for mobile and internet usage is also growing rapidly. A history of poor international bandwidth / connectivity has meant speeds have remained slow. South Africaâ€™s internet users grew from 4.6 million to 5.3 million last year, a rise of 15%, according to research by World Wide Worx, a technology and research and strategy organisation, sponsored by Cisco. The climb follows years of stagnation between 2002 to 2007, when internet penetration in South Africa never rose above 7%.
